text:
-haq yadEqva yaqj~ja uqlbaNa#M kriqyatEq tasyaiqvaiShA SAntiqrmanu#rBava jaqnayAq daivyaqM janaqmityA#ha mAnaqvyO# vai praqjAstA EqvA&&*dyA$H kurutEq mana#sO haqviraqsItyA#ha svaqgAkRu#tyaiq gAtrA#NAM tE gAtraqBAjO# BUyAqsmEtyA#hAq &&*SiSha#mEqvaitAmA SA$stEq tasyaiq vA EqtasyAq Eka#mEqvA-dE#vayajanaqM 
~MyadAla#bdhAyAmaqBrO - [  ]   13
